speaker: Agent
text: Hello, this is Mark from XYZ Collections. How are you today?

speaker: Customer
text: Hi Mark, I’m doing alright. What’s this about?

speaker: Agent
text: I’m reaching out regarding your account with Fast Loan Co. Could you please confirm your identity for security purposes?

speaker: Customer
text: Sure, what do you need from me?

speaker: Agent
text: Could you provide your full name and the last four digits of your Social Security number?

speaker: Customer
text: My name is Jamie Taylor, and the last four digits are 1234.

speaker: Agent
text: Thank you, Jamie. I see here you have an outstanding balance of $400 on your account. How would you like to proceed?

speaker: Customer
text: That’s a lot. Can I set up a payment plan?

speaker: Agent
text: Yes, we can definitely do that! Typically, we can arrange a plan of $100 a month. Does that work for you?

speaker: Customer
text: That sounds manageable. What do I need to do?

speaker: Agent
text: I’ll send the agreement to your email. Please sign it and return it to us.

speaker: Customer
text: Okay, I’ll keep an eye out for that.

speaker: Agent
text: Thank you, Jamie. If you have any questions, feel free to call back.

speaker: Customer
text: Thanks, Mark. I appreciate your help.
